properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICK, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDR, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICK FROM MEMBER WHERE SECESSION_FL = 'N'

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICK, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDR, PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENROLL_DT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
